website_summaries.verdict: ​The Xiaomi Yi Action Cam's video quality and shooting options are well above those of other cameras in its class, but you'll need to bring your own accessories.
pros: The Xiaomi Yi Action Cam offers more camera features and better video and photo quality than you'll typically find at its price
It has a removable battery and a standard 1/4-20-inch tripod mount, and the Micro-HDMI port supports live video output while recording to a microSD card
cons: The instructions and parts of the mobile app are in Chinese, so it'll require some minor guesswork when starting out if you can't read Chinese
No memory card, mounts or housings are included and the Yi isn't waterproof on its own

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: I never actually got to try this camera because the second I put in a memory card. turned it on and connected it to my phone, it began beeping loudly, blinking lights and would not turn off unless the battery was removed. I've been dealing with YI tech support for hours now and every agent I've spoken with has been useless. At this point, they have essentially told me there's nothing they can do. Terrible support, terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa

customer_reviews.title: 240fps is why I bought this
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap camera. You'll need the phone app to do anything with this camera. I use an old android phone to run the app. I bought it for the 240fps feature. In same lighting my gopro3 blows this thing away in terms of image quality in both dim and sun lit filming/pics. If you are needing an all around gopro knock-off then do not buy this, get one that has a lcd screen with menus you can use right on the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bing W.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Camera for such a low price !!
customer_reviews.text: I own Go Pro Hero 3 silver as well Yi Action camera. For the price point of view i feel Yi action camera is better choice. The video clarity is superb and the image stabilization is top notch in comparison to Go Pro. I could not test the battery backup completely as the camera will be plugged into car USB terminal or to an external battery. The only flaw which is kind of deal breaker for me is the Audio capture. The inbuilt microphone is not as expected and fails to capture at high speed in race track. On top of cannot use external microphone. The below is the link of my track day video [...]
customer_reviews.author: Narendra

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Great quality for a really nice price. As other people have said, the controls are a little annoying, but it is worth the hassle. The picture quality is excellent. I purchased the Yi waterproof case and took it on a trip to Mexico. We used it scuba diving and snorkeling without any problems. I just wish I could find an affordable gimbal for it because the picture is very shaky without one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MichiganFan

customer_reviews.title: So happy I just got 2 more.
customer_reviews.text: I am actually amazed, I've read some bad reviews, but after personally comparing it to other cameras I just got 2 more. Image is really amazing considering the price, it has all the bells and whistles you would expect from high dollar gadgets. Definitely 5/5 recommend to anyone who would like to start with some sport/action videos, you can get a full set for different angles for the same price as just one of the other competitors, and this is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item in June 2016, and only had one opportunity to use it before I got busy with other activities, but I had no problem with resolution, focus, etc. It worked just fine, and I had power when I took it on a trip about a month later (although not used on that trip). The short video I made showed crisp colors, focused well on near and far objects simultaneously, and no significant distortion. Although I overlaid the original sound with a music track, the microphone picked up just fine. I would give 5 stars, but I feel I should try a few more uses before completely endorsing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Moore

customer_reviews.title: Firmware Problems
customer_reviews.text: Tried updating the firmware on TWO of these cameras to the latest 1.5.12 firmware. Both cameras exhibit the same behavior and get bricked. They just reboot themselves immediately after turning on. Constant loop. After you upgrade I've tried so many firmware and elf files and none work. I have been left with two bricked cameras and Yi support has done nothing.
customer_reviews.author: aarocha

customer_reviews.title: Working and perfect english Android application to do recording
customer_reviews.text: ... Completely stunned by the performance. 1080p 60fps flawlessly. Working and perfect english Android application to do recording, pictures, time-lapse, and file transfer. (though you do not need to use it) Also, the manual was easy to read and understand. Compared to my GoPro Hero 4 the images are only slightly different in terms of contrast - and I honestly think the YI Action Camera has a better auto-adjust when it comes to light levels (like pointing near and at the sun).
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Updating can be a hassle
customer_reviews.text: When I got the camera, it wouldn’t turn all the way on and it kept prompting me to update and didn’t have a manual (the one I got later came with one so don’t worry too much). But after reading how to update it, I messed up the update and it bricked. Had to send it back and get another one but this camera is a great alternative to getting a GoPro. Even if you have problems, just get on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, especially for the price. Few things that need to be done upon getting it. Focus is set for rather close, I prefer to refocus it further out for sharper image in the distance, also if using for multirotor recordibgs, flip the mic upside down for a better sound. Also I run a custom script for image processing for better results. Google WaffleV8 Yi script.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett N.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that takes great video.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm very happy with this camera. For the price the quality of the video that I get is great. I regularly shoot at 1080/60 and the video is smooth and when the lighting is good, pin sharp. Overall, we're thrilled that we were able to get the camera, two memory cards, an accessories kit with waterproof mount, and two extra batteries and still spent well less than half what we would have on a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Louis DiMeglio

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than GoPro, just as great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and at 1/5 the price of a GoPro (which we already owned and sadly lost on a trip), you can't go wrong. If you're buying the waterproof housing, I suggest the actual Yi brand to ensure the best fit and safety. We got tons of great videos and pics, underwater and above, with this on its first trip out. Skip the GoPro and save yourself some money for a cheaper, quality option.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Simply a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best video/photo action camera for the price by far. The ONLY weakness is no LCD display. The mobile device APP works much better than SJCAMs solutions, and can provide a framing perspective. The YI also makes it very easy to swap lenses. Investing a little in a after-market rectilinear (non fish eye) lens produces stunning results. If you're not happy with these cameras, then your expectations are far too high.
customer_reviews.author: mcwdes

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for beginners, people on the go and Vloggers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I keep it on me all day so I can capture video and time lapses for vlogs. It's a great, cheaper alternative to GoPros and the video quality is great. I would recommend getting some backup batteries though as filming in 1080p, 60fps will drain your battery pretty quick. Also be sure to purchase a micro SD card, the camera can handle up to a 128GB card. Also keep in mind that you cannot transfer pictures via the USB/power cable, you have to transfer your media using the micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: dirty, used,and broken
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible, there is nothing worse than to open a "NEW" Camera just to find out its covered in finger prints. Too top that off, I found out it was broken, after I spent money on accessories for the dang thing. Please save your money and buy anything but YI Cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took some amazing pics and videos all with some of the largest ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this over spring break at Port Aransas with the Waterproof case. Took some amazing pics and videos all with some of the largest waves I have seen at Port A. The waterproof case held up great. We also have a GoPro and this compares favorably at less than half the price. Some features I actually like better than our GoPro 3. The only thing is the lack of the monochrome LCD screen to let you know what mode you are in at the time. Even with that, we didn't have much trouble because of the LED light around the power button.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1080p 30 & 60
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera for its price, but now better cameras have common long for a little bit more. Hate that everything is controlled by the app and has to be preset. It is compatible with many GoPro adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: At a quarter of the price of a gopro and ...
customer_reviews.text: At a quarter of the price of a gopro and almost the same quality, I'll take these over gopro every time. But the real bonus is the modifications you can make with scripts. It's a steep learning curve but once you figure it out these are far more customizable than any other action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I would like to tell you this is an uncommon issue but ...
customer_reviews.text: WHATEVER YOU DO...DO NOT TRY TO UPDATE THIS CAMERA!!!! After being told to update the camera on the application, the camera is completely unusable. I would like to tell you this is an uncommon issue but it happens to nearly everyone that tries to update the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality camera (great pictures and videos)
customer_reviews.text: This action camera (yi us version) is equivalent to the gopro hero 4, bUT it is way cheaper. It is definitely worth the price. The video and picture quality was outstanding. Full review on youtube: search t8thegr8 yi action camera review PROS: good quality videos (2k really clear), really good pics, wifi setting, yi app allows easy transfer of pics and videos to your phone, small, cheap, and lots of settings on app CONS: settings not adjustable on camera, no lcd screen(aftermarket one available), and audio is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few months. Great quality. Only 8ssue was that the back must have been a bit loose, so lost power during a flight on my quadcopter. Did cause a crash, but I'm a bit of a noob. Bit of paper towel under Tha battery cover and no further issues. Great picture and great fpv.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Quality on this thing is suprisingly amazing. frame rate is extremely high
customer_reviews.text: Quality on this thing is suprisingly amazing. frame rate is extremely high, quality is up to 1080p, and its also wifi and thats useful. One thing I recommend getting for this is an external battery of more than 1 battery if you are shooting a video throughout your day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vanner

customer_reviews.title: I am not very impressed.  Maybe I have a lemon or a subpar sensor.
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly out of focus. Just doesn't hold up to other cameras. My galaxy s7 takes far better videos than it does. I'm just not very impressed. Lowlight is awful. Perhaps mine had a clone sensor or something but I just think maybe it isn't a very good device.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great price. 95% as good as a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The batter does not last long and this is the cheap version so it does not have a touchscreen on the back. The quality is 95% as good as anything you will get on a $400 GoPro for a quarter of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Enzweiler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for the price. It is definitely comparable to a Go Pro. Not quite up to par with the Hero 4, but definitely on par if not a little better than the Hero +. A few little quirks...no built in LCD, takes a few seconds to warm up when turning on, but these are only minor quirks. The app is very well done and easy to use. I would recommend this camera to anyone wanting an adequate sport cam for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great i love it#
customer_reviews.text: A very good action cam handy and easy to use it takes great pictures also, I have used it on several trips and am impressed with ease of functionality it's great underwater with the case of course.
customer_reviews.author: Ballzdeep

customer_reviews.title: Might want to avoid if you just want it to work.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. They've both bricked and have required a full reset more than once. If that isn't want you want to deal with....save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: T Beezy

customer_reviews.title: works very well for my outdoor activities. it's almost ...
customer_reviews.text: works very well for my outdoor activities. it's almost a 5 star, but my one suggestion is it is difficult to tell if you are on photo vs video mode, there is a red light on top that indicates this, but it is hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Pez

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Really high quality video and audio, at a very reasonable price. I have wanted a GoPro for years, but I feel like this thing is just as good. I'm really happy I bought it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Righteous Priest

customer_reviews.title: VIDEO LOOKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Nice may not be as good as a GoPro 4k camera but it is a very good camera and what a deal. VIDEO LOOKS GREAT If your looking for a 100 dollar action camera just buy this one you will be very happy with it,
customer_reviews.author: Drk5ide

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun little camera to document travels and fun times at the beach. Works great. Video quality is nice. Dont think you can best the price
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, bought it to replace my list go pro 3. Very good quality video for a third of the price. I'm using the waffleFPV script.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty great. Recommend installing the App on your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty great. Recommend installing the App on your phone to customize the device. I turned off all the front LED rings because it was annoying. Much cheaper than a gopro for pretty much the same device.
customer_reviews.author: Nghi

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, thinking about buying a second one
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, thinking about buying a second one. I can't see any reason to buy a GoPro when I can get 60fps@1080p@32Mbps without issue. The sound quality is a bit lacking but still tolerable, probably because I use it on my boat which is a loud environment.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable GoPro competition
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. The video/picture quality is amazing for the price. My only complaint is the iPhone companion app. It works, but it can be a bit buggy at times. If you are in the market for a GoPro, I recommend considering the Yi. It easily performs as good as a Hero3
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years back and I’m still trying to figure out how to use it :/
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No selfie stick just camera
customer_reviews.text: Works good sounds are not great but 2k is awesome quality. Never received the selfie stick I was too received kinda bummed since I thought it was. No remote or selfie stick?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. fReviewMan

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse used risk
customer_reviews.text: Bought an open box return from amazon warehouse that was listed like new... and while it looked perfect, once I flipped it over the battery cover was completely busted. Was excited to get this but now have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gema

customer_reviews.title: As good as GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good. Video quality just like a GoPro for 1/3rd the price. Use your Phone to setup the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: A. Panek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After only being used just for about 4 times, this camera stopped to work! I fell so frustrated, because I really love the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Go pro alternative
customer_reviews.text: Excellent video and picture quality, easy to use, app is easy to work with. It is a good go pro alternative. I like mine a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest fam

customer_reviews.title: good in bright light
customer_reviews.text: Wide angle, good in bright light, but falls apart when the sunsets. Great functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chin

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera especially for the price. Video out through usb works great for fpv.
customer_reviews.author: dahos

customer_reviews.title: Forget Gopro
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these-bought two for my kids. The ios app works incredibly well. I can see no reason to spend the $ for a go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Ven

customer_reviews.title: And it's still working great. Video quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now almost two now. And it's still working great. Video quality is good. Can't notice difference between my buddies GoPro and the YI.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for starting vlogs or even messing around. Shooting in 1080p 60fps and being around 80$ is a definite win in my book! Good quality and easy to use features make this a great purchase. You can even sync to your phone through wifi and control every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Trilla rilla

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: For the price it gives the other competitor (you know the $300 one) a run for its money
customer_reviews.author: WillP

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Allows you to test the waters before taking a plunge to buy the GoPro or another more expensive variant. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: as

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, bought this on sale and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, bought this on sale and it has been one of the best investments. Only down side is the fast battery usage but you can always buy extras to carry since they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Not for racing drones
customer_reviews.text: This is a good one if you are looking to footage that doesn't involve too much vibration like "not to put it in a racing drone" other than that it is fine !
customer_reviews.author: Javier Riveros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera on the go, action cam almost better than the gopro
customer_reviews.author: Evaristi Kullolli

customer_reviews.title: The picture is not great quality. I have yet to figure out an ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not great quality. I have yet to figure out an easy way to get the photos from the camera to my macbook. Admittedly I'm a bit of a luddite troglodyte
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Takes good quality video and photos, WiFi streaming works ok for fpv drone flying, is a little laggy at times. Otherwise great action camera especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been pushing this camera to the limit, dog also chewed on it. Still working.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 5 months in does not work
customer_reviews.text: 5 months in does not work, powers on won’t record
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun and affordable camera, make sure to get the waterproof case.
customer_reviews.author: waterman28

customer_reviews.title: Deaply sorry to report the Yi action cam has Terrible image quality
customer_reviews.text: Deaply sorry to report the Yi action cam has Terrible image quality.. .. i was expecting a little more
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera wont charge UPDATED After few days, the seller contacted me and sent me a new item to replace the camera. Now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for it price. Sharp and beautiful video and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Had been looking at the Xioami version as an option, when this popped up. Glad I waited.
customer_reviews.author: Nils D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great cam.. takes great pics and video. very warm and smooth picture compared to othe cameras
customer_reviews.author: GREGG

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for cheap
customer_reviews.text: I do Skits as a student in film and this thing is amazing, and with all the accessories available it's just great.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera. This thing is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. This thing is worth every penny. The app you use with it is great, you can download videos and photos straight from the camera to your phone, operate all functions and settings of the camera through the app and view the live feed. This camera now shoots 2k video(software update) and you can buy a waterproof housing that will fit all the go pro accessories and mounts. For 3 to 4 hundred less and even better picture quality in my opinion, this thing is an awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Exellent  camera, perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this camera to my car and made some cool videoes. Lots of options, good wifi and rugged build. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An awesome action camera for little money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera for CHEAP. I have mine set up with scripts running 2k @ 50mb/s. Looks amazing and very close in quality to the gorpro 4 silver. The OEM battery is pretty weak so buy extras or better yet buy the extended battery for 4 hours of continuous recording! I ended up using with with my android wrist watch as a view finder and to change settings. SWEET!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.FixItTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality- easy to setup with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera is as expected but the battery has died after 3 charges.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse heiserman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: what bites is that battery gets drained when not charging
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Jose Molina

customer_reviews.title: See video on youtube!
customer_reviews.text: I have made so many video's with this. I own many 1080p cameras, and this one is my favorite. You can watch my latest Youtube video here:
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great budget action cam
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Picture is great, audio leaves something to be desired but for the price, on fleek. Happy with the purchase and would do it all over again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: gmsuperfan

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: This camera provides superb clarity and resolution. Good battery life. Easy to operate. and at a price that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.author: ECP

customer_reviews.title: Best high-quality action camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new YI Action Camera! It takes such great quality photos and is really easy to use--really user-friendly app. I've used the GoPro Silver Plus a few times and prefer the YI way more, especially because of cost and performance. Would recommend this camera to/for anyone--someone who is experienced with photography or a novice hoping to take some cool shots!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Greate camera
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on other XiaoYi product listings, I wanted to wait until the U.S. version came out since I didn’t want to deal with the Chinese instruction manuals. This U.S. version works great for me. The photos and videos come out nicely and it's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the camera is extremely grainy and not ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the camera is extremely grainy and not at all what I expected. I had also assumed there would be a screen in the back of the camera to playback videos I have previously taken, but that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STATIC SOUND WHEN RECORDING...
customer_reviews.text: Just got the camera today and there is a muffled static sound in every video, very noticeable when it is quiet........ Any suggestions or answers? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Manning

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This cam deserved 4 stars when new, but now after 4 months it deserves only 1 star because it quit working or charging and computer does not detect its USB connection. It is practically dead. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Yousuf E. M. Ebrahim

customer_reviews.title: Okay once you fix the wifi interference sound problem
customer_reviews.text: So this is a super cool little camera for a good price. BUT there is significant wifi interference which causes a 'helicopter' like tick-tick-ticking in the audio. There's a fix: [...] - but you have to open up the case and add a littel piece of tape over the wifi atenenna. Not hard, but definitely annoying. Once done though, it works great! And if you only plan on using it without audio recording then this is a 5-star camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Caleshu

customer_reviews.title: A time waster
customer_reviews.text: Will not turn on , tried factory reset but nothing. pulled out battery and sd card and camera turns on , but reinstalled sd card and it shuts back off. Researched hours of video and blogs only to get more frustraded. Not to mention the usps tracking was a lie. It's Going back then im cacelling my account .Was a beutiful day today but i spent it fighting this camera instead of taking videos. Sad because i researched for a month before deciding to go with YI I should of got a go pro the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Chinese cheap made camera .steer away from this one .bought 2 .and both had problems .battery life is about 30 min .lol
customer_reviews.author: dr green

customer_reviews.title: Poor Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera did not work well for me, at all. Picture quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Cal

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to connect to cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this camera! The positive reviews are hard to believe now that I have the camera. So far, I have wasted 90 minutes trying to connect the camera to my phone. The directions are horrible. It is not even clear what app should be used. Some of the directions are in Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned right away. Could not get it to connect to phone or tablet. Tried everything even customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but I bought it in combination with a waterproof kit and my camera is at the bottom of a lake, sure wish I could get a new one but I don't have the money to keep buying them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hopper

customer_reviews.title: The product has a rather significat problem. There is ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has a rather significat problem. There is basically no sound. Don't buy it!!! I can't quite believe Amazon is selling it without letting its customers know about this. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: JustACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ir wasn't at all what I was hoping for in a camera
customer_reviews.author: Karla H.

product_meta.title: YI Action Camera (US Edition) White
feature_bullets: Ambarella A7LS chipset, low-power digital signal processing (DSP) technology, high-definition (HD) H.264/ MJPEG video engine and a 700-MHz ARM11 applications processor.
Sony IMX206, 1/2.3", 16MP CMOS image sensor with Exmor R ability / Panasonic MN34120PA, 1/2.3", 16MP CMOS image sensor
Bluetooth (4.0BLE low power consumption) and Built-in (802.11 bgn) Single band 2.4G Wi-Fi
Official U.S. Edition limited release of the YI Action Camera (optimized for U.S. market, increased battery life, meets international requirements, English)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars318 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
